template.description: For vehicles that have ability to be towed by others.

float.name: pivot_offset
float.description: How far behind is trailer's tow hitch situated.

float.name: weight
float.description: Weight of trailer taken into consideration when deciding if a tractor can tow this trailer. If tractor's max_trailer_weight is greater than trailer's weight, towing will be allowed.

float.name: attaching_duration
float.description: Time it takes crew to attach trailer to a tractor vehicle, in seconds.

float.name: detaching_duration
float.description: Time it takes crew to dettach trailer from a tractor vehicle, in seconds.
